## Features

**Multimodality**

The distribution has more than one peaks.

**Asymmetry**

The distribution is skewed to the left or right.

**Rounding**

Only certain values can be found

**Outliers**

Values far from the rest of the data.

**Impossibilities**

Values outside the feasible range.

**Errors**

Wrong values.

**Gaps**

Ranges of values where no case is recorded within the data

**Heaping**

Values that occur unexpectedly frequent.
